Color.Name: Overlay Color
Color.Hint: Ignored if using an overlay image.

Color.Name: Partials Color
Color.Hint: If empty, the overlay color will be used.{break}If using an overlay image while this is set, the partials will be colored for the GM, but not for the players.

Opacity.Name: Partials Opacity
Opacity.Hint: GM's will see a weighed opacity for the partially revealed spaces, calculated from the other opacities. This calculated value is shown on the right.

GridReveal.Name: Extended Revealed Spaces (units)
GridReveal.Hint: The revealed grid spaces extend a certain amount into hidden and partially revealed spaces. Does not extend the partially revealed spaces. The units used is what's given in the scene settings.

Position.Name: Overlay Position
Position.Hint: Whether it should display below tiles and textures or above.

Choices.behindDrawings: Cover the map and non-overhead tiles
Choices.behindTokens: Cover the map, non-overhead tiles, and drawings
